name: LSPECTROniversus (Beta)
description: An all-new competitive video game that features multiple playmodes to make settling disputes fun! Fight against or alongside your friends in the awesome Barbarian Battleground in brawl mode! Prove your worth to those who've doubted you by beating them to the other side of the Great Hall of Girth in Jeremiah's universal Gargantuan Gallery in race mode!
author: LSPECTROniverse Games
